mapper.sql: TRADE_ORDER_ID as tradeOrderId, ACCOUNT_ID as accountId, ACCOUNT_TYPE as accountType, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID as opponentAccountId, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE as opponentAccountType, BUY_OR_SELL as buyOrSell, COMMODITY_ID as commodityId, COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY as commodityUnitQuantity, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE as commodityUnitPrice, COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY as commodityStandardQuantity, COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE as commodityStandardPrice, FEE_PERCENT as feePercent, FEE_PRICE as feePrice, COUPON_INFO as couponInfo, COUPON_PRICE as couponPrice, ACTUAL_PRICE as actualPrice, INCOME_PAY_INFO as incomePayInfo, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS as commodityFlowRecordIds, REMARK as remark, STATUS as status, CREATE_TIME as createTime, ORDER_TIME as orderTime, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME as applyCancelTime, SUCCESS_TIME as successTime, CLOSE_TIME as closeTime, EXPIRE_TIME as expireTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from trade_order
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into trade_order (ACCOUNT_ID, ACCOUNT_TYPE, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE, BUY_OR_SELL, COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE, COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY, COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE, FEE_PERCENT, FEE_PRICE, COUPON_INFO, COUPON_PRICE, ACTUAL_PRICE, INCOME_PAY_INFO, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS, REMARK, STATUS, CREATE_TIME, ORDER_TIME, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME, SUCCESS_TIME, CLOSE_TIME, EXPIRE_TIME ) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opponentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opponentAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{buyOrSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commodityStandardQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{commodityStandardPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{feePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{couponInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{actualPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update trade_order
TRADE_ORDER_ID = #{record.tradeOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.opponentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.opponentAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUY_OR_SELL = #{record.buyOrSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_ID = #{record.commodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE = #{record.commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityStandardQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE = #{record.commodityStandardPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FEE_PERCENT = #{record.feePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_PRICE = #{record.feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COUPON_INFO = #{record.couponInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUPON_PRICE = #{record.couponPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACTUAL_PRICE = #{record.actualPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INCOME_PAY_INFO = #{record.incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{record.commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_CANCEL_TIME = #{record.applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{record.successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_TIME = #{record.closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update trade_order set TRADE_ORDER_ID = #{record.tradeOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{record.opponentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{record.opponentAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_OR_SELL = #{record.buyOrSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_ID = #{record.commodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE = #{record.commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY = #{record.commodityStandardQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE = #{record.commodityStandardPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FEE_PERCENT = #{record.feePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE_PRICE = #{record.feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COUPON_INFO = #{record.couponInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUPON_PRICE = #{record.couponPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACTUAL_PRICE = #{record.actualPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INCOME_PAY_INFO = #{record.incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{record.commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_TIME = #{record.orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME = #{record.applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUCCESS_TIME = #{record.successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_TIME = #{record.closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{record.expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update trade_order
ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{opponentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{opponentAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUY_OR_SELL = #{buyOrSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_ID = #{commodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{commodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE = #{commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY = #{commodityStandardQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE = #{commodityStandardPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FEE_PERCENT = #{feePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FEE_PRICE = #{feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
COUPON_INFO = #{couponInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUPON_PRICE = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ACTUAL_PRICE = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT},
INCOME_PAY_INFO = #{incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_CANCEL_TIME = #{applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where TRADE_ORDER_ID = #{tradeOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update trade_order set ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_ID = #{opponentAccountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OPPONENT_ACCOUNT_TYPE = #{opponentAccountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUY_OR_SELL = #{buyOrSell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_ID = #{commodityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_UNIT_QUANTITY = #{commodityUnitQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_UNIT_PRICE = #{commodityUnitPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COMMODITY_STANDARD_QUANTITY = #{commodityStandardQuantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COMMODITY_STANDARD_PRICE = #{commodityStandardPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FEE_PERCENT = #{feePercent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FEE_PRICE = #{feePrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, COUPON_INFO = #{couponInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUPON_PRICE = #{couponPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ACTUAL_PRICE = #{actualPrice,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INCOME_PAY_INFO = #{incomePayInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_FLOW_RECORD_IDS = #{commodityFlowRecordIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDER_TIME = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_CANCEL_TIME = #{applyCancelTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SUCCESS_TIME = #{successTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_TIME = #{closeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EXPIRE_TIME = #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where TRADE_ORDER_ID = #{tradeOrderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
